relation: iopfile Full pathname of IOP dataset. Default: set by build-namelist.
scm_crm_mode Column radiation mode. Default: FALSE
scm_diurnal_avg If using diurnal averaging or not. Default: FALSE
scm_iop_srf_prop Use the specified surface properties. Default: FALSE
scmlat Latitude value of single column. Default: none.
scmlon Longitude value of single column. Default: none.
single_column Set to TRUE to turn on single column mode. Default: FALSE
